ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Has this ever happened to you?? and what can you do when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: I constantly have to remind my mother to calm down when she s hunting stuff. She s one of the get out of my camp type people. She was farming silks with her
ygData.messageBody:
I constantly have to remind my mother to calm down when she's hunting stuff.
She's one of the "get out of my camp" type people. She was farming silks
with her lvl 17 and got mad bc a lvl 4 came over and was trying to hunt mobs
in the same area (the newbie area). She kept having a fit that he was going
after the mobs she wanted to kill. When I tried to explain to her that
technically farming is against the rules and the lvl 4 had every right to
hunt and wasn't doing anything wrong or even rude, she just yelled at me.
Then later on she was camping a spot with her lvl 10 where she was getting
xp and swirling shadows. A Baron came up and started killing mobs all around
her. She told him that she was getting xp from them and asked him to stop it
bc she'd been there first. He told her she could get xp elsewhere and that
he just wanted the swirling shadows. but she was after those too. After the
tried to reason with him he got mad and told her to go ahead and petition,
and then started intentionally ksing every lesser shade she attacked. I
mentioned it to some of my guild alliance and I think one of them said
something to him bc he went away. I mean, the dude could've gotten more
swirling shadows off of the shadows in twilight sea but he had to be a dick
and KS a lvl 10. But I guess what goes around comes around.
I had someone else ks me at the same camp before. He said I was being a
bitch when I complained that he ksed 3 mobs that I had snared and was in the
process of fighting. Some people are just jerks.
luv,
-Su


It is amazing that people can play this game to the mid-20s and not
understand that accidents happen. I am talking
about them Frez, not you. You did nothing wrong, these individuals
sound like anti-social babies. I wouldn't worry,
your reputation will overcome the lies.

I have been playing EQ since the month it came out and have had people
shout "GET LOST -OUR CAMP!!" when I
just ran by (not through) the camp with nothing arggo!
There are some real idiots in the game that don't understand that 1)
don't know how to share, 2) don't understand
that if you play enough, you will get accidently trained, you will die
because someone makes a mistake. If people can't understand that
they need to either grow up or not play at all.
